content: return receipts arrive entirely at the choice of the recipient. They are tuned off in my Thunderbird so you would assume it was broken if you asked for one when emailing me.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: I have tested this with a friend I have it set to on and he is not getting a request to acknowledge he received the email.
creator: rbsales

content: No there is no pinning. Perhaps use the tag feature (pressing 1 when the message is selected in the list will tag it important for instance), and then a save search (Ctrl_Shift+R) to create a virtual folder containing your tagged email.
creator: MattAuSupport
